comments:
Eclipse R32M4
1) Open feature.xml from CVS repository view or from a feature project in your workspace.
2) Goto "Plug-ins" tab
3) Either double click or "Open" from the context menu on a plugin that is NOT in your workspace.

>> Error will not occur if the plugin project is in workspace.
>> opening a feature from the "Included Features" tab just beeps (no npe) when it is not in the workspace.

Stacktrace for NPE
